snippet: The Giants won the Super Bowl on Sunday night, and that means the mayor of East Rutherford, N.J., will collect on his wager that the team would prevail over the New England Patriots.
abstract: The Giants won the Super Bowl on Sunday night, and that means the mayor of East Rutherford, N.J., will collect on his wager that the team would prevail over the New England Patriots.
lead_paragraph: The Giants, thank the stars, won the Super Bowl on Sunday night, and that means the mayor will collect on his wager that the team would prevail over the New England Patriots.

headline.main: A Mayor (No, Not That One) Cashes In on a Super Bowl Bet
